metadata.title: CVE-2020-12388 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The Firefox content processes did not sufficiently lockdown access controlwhich could result in a sandbox escape. *Note: this issue only affectsFirefox on Windows operating systems.*. This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 68.8 and Firefox < 76.

criterions.comment: mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
